about_top_des_two: One-stop to provide merchants with professional, fast, easy to use and mature payment risk control products
about_des: WeTech is deeply involved in the financial industry and focuses on cross-border financial risk control. WeTech is a multi-scenario, big data, and fully intelligent fintech product service provider.
about_content_one: WeTech has the world's most cutting-edge database, powerful data analysis capabilities and risk control models, automatic decision-making engine. With flexible and varied business solutions as well as high standard customer service, we have served numerous independent websites, leading sellers, website building platforms, payment companies, etc.
about_content_two: WeTech is committed to providing merchants and payment companies with complete risk control solutions to identify fraud, reduce chargeback rate and improve order pass rate, and thus to increase revenue and create value.
